text: Psalm 112
The Path of the Righteous and the Path of the Wicked
Praise Yah!\f + \fr 112:1 \ft Hebrew \fqa hallelujah \ft  \f*
Blessed \add is the\add* man \add who\add* fears Yahweh;
he takes great delight in his commands.
His ⸤descendants⸥\f + \fr 112:2 \ft Literally “seed” \f* will be mighty in the land;
\add the\add* generation of \add the\add* upright will be blessed.
Wealth and riches \add are\add* in his house,
and his righteousness endures forever.
\add His\add* light rises in the darkness for the upright;
\add he is\add* gracious and compassionate and righteous.
\add It goes\add* well \add for\add* a man \add who\add* is gracious and lends,
\add who\add* conducts his ⸤business properly⸥.\f + \fr 112:5 \ft Literally “matters in justice” \f*
For he will not be shaken forever;
\add the\add* righteous ⸤will be remembered forever⸥.\f + \fr 112:6 \ft Literally “will be for an eternal remembrance” \f*
He is not afraid of bad news;
his heart \add is\add* steadfast, secure\f + \fr 112:7 \ft Or “full of trust” \f* in Yahweh.
His heart \add is\add* sustained; he will not be afraid,
until he looks \add in triumph\add* on his enemies.
⸤He gives lavishly⸥\f + \fr 112:9 \ft Literally “He distributes freely, he gives” \f* to the needy;
his righteousness endures forever.
His horn rises high in honor.
\add The\add* wicked\f + \fr 112:10 \ft Singular \f* sees \add it\add* and is vexed.
He gnashes his teeth and ⸤becomes weak⸥.\f + \fr 112:10 \ft Literally “and melts” \f*
\add The\add* desire of \add the\add* wicked\f + \fr 112:10 \ft Plural \f* perishes.
